Package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.controller

package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.controller
UI controller classes (Activity and Fragment subclasses) and any supporting nested classes.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle
    Base package of Application Starter app.
    edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.adapter
     
    edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.hilt
    Dagger/Hilt modules that provide methods to satisfy dependencies which are not completely handled by Inject and other Hilt dependency-injection mechanisms.
    edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model
    Sub-packages containing entity classes and data-access object (DAO) interfaces.
    edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service
    Repository and service classes providing access to device & external services, permissions & preferences, and the app's persistent data store.
    edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.viewmodel
    ViewModel and AndroidViewModel subclasses maintaining cross-configuration-change state (and providing high-level asynchronous mutation operations on the app's mutable state, persistent or otherwise) for UI controllers.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    EndGameFragment
    This Fragment is used to inflate the end of game message screen when a game is completed.
    GameFragment
    Demonstrates access to and observation of LiveData elements in LoginViewModel, UserViewModel, PermissionsViewModel, and PreferencesViewModel, as well as acting as a navigation placeholder.
    LoginActivity
    Presents a simple login screen, which is bypassed if a silent refresh/sign-in attempt succeeds.
    MainActivity
    Used to control the main screen activity and navigation between screens.
    ScoresFragment
    Handles and inflates the scores screen.
    SettingsFragment
    Presents a standard settings screen, populated from the PreferenceScreen declared in res/xml/settings.xml.
